title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the File Type
description: Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon. A dialog box will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok.

Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but the file extension is not shown.
EB: After clicking Ok, the SaveAs operation should create a file with the correct file type (e.g., .java) and the Navigator should display the file with the appropriate file icon.
